articles.title: Siegfried Fischbacher, illusionist of Siegfried & Roy, dead at 81 - CNN
articles.description: Siegfried Fischbacher, an illusionist known for working with exotic cats as one half of Siegfried & Roy, has died from pancreatic cancer, according to his publicist Dave Kirvin.
